pullRequest.title: Fix spheroid extra fire control weight arc indices
pullRequest.bodyText:
The virtual aft side locations on spheroid dropships and small craft have a different index offset in the named constants and the method that calculates whether extra tonnage is needed for fire control. The constant takes the hull location into account while the calculation method does not. The fix is in the first commit. The other two commits are code cleanup, mostly involving removing String concatenation from StringBuilder#append calls.
Fixes MegaMek/megameklab#668

commit.message: Fix inconsistent index offset for spheroid rear arcs.
